content: center bottom beginning row i do the arms first so i can see where the middle of the body is going to be then start stitching the leg from the center of the body towards the hip page 7 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com sew the tail to the back of the body with the bottom of the tail at the 5th row from the center bottom the tail should assumedly cover part of the back seam but it doesn t usually work out that way all that s left to do now is sew on the ears page 8 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com start the inner edge of the ear 4 row from the center top of the head working your way about 4 row down as you can see in the pictures page 9 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com sunshine finished but for her face here are two examples of faces for your teddy bear i use a black 4 ply yarn which i divide into two strands it gets all twisty but once you start the face it doesn t twist so much good luck and be creative page 10 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
